mainHero.title: Good Enough
mainHero.subtitle: Track your expire items
mainHero.description: In the US between 30-40 percent of the food supply get to waste, big changes start with one single step, be that small change and avoid your food going to waste.

product.title: Help the world by helping yourself first

items.title: Help the world
items.description: Add your products and avoid food wastage, instead of buying new food, remember which food do you have and use it instead of wasting it and if you don't want it? Donate it.

items.title: Whenever, wherever
items.description: Doesn't matter the place, doesn't matter the hour, just add your products and get reminded which items are about to expired.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best web technologies!
features.description: Using the latest web technology api you can run the application in your browser, in your phone or tablets.

items.name: Share your lists
items.description: Share your list with your contacts

items.name: Get Insights
items.description: Get Insights on how your money is spend.

items.name: Get Alerts
items.description: Get alerts when your items are about to expire.

items.name: Multiplatform
items.description: Support for multiple screen size and can be installed as a native application.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
